bibl.title: P. Oxy. 2078, Vat. Gr. 2228, and Vergil's Charon.
bibl.note: P. Oxy. XVII, 2078 (= Pack2 254). Vergil has transferred the function of Euripides' Aeacus to Charon and created out of Aeacus' speech an innovative psychological dynamic for Charon.
bibl.seg: CLARK Raymond J., P. Oxy. 2078, Vat. Gr. 2228, and Vergil's Charon.
P. Oxy. XVII, 2078 (= Pack2 254). Vergil has transferred the function of Euripides' Aeacus to Charon and created out of Aeacus' speech an innovative psychological dynamic for Charon.
